name: Eevee
author: sui
flavor_text: A rare Pokémon that adapts to harsh environments by taking on different evolutionary forms.

abilities.name: Energy Evolution
abilities.effect: When you attach a basic Energy card from your hand to this Pokémon, you may search your deck for a card that evolves from this Pokémon that is the same type as that Energy card and put it onto this Pokémon. (This counts as evolving this Pokémon.) Shuffle your deck afterward.
